# UITextInteractionMode.editable

**Case**

A mode indicating that the text interaction should provide selection behaviors for editable text.

## Declaration

```swift
case editable
```

## Modes

- **UITextInteractionMode.nonEditable**: A mode indicating that the text interaction should provide selection behaviors for non-editable, read-only text.

items.description: A mode indicating that the text interaction should provide selection behaviors for non-editable, read-only text.
items.name: UITextInteractionMode.nonEditable
